:insert-hazardstatement.label: t__Hazard statement
:insert-hazardstatement.description: t__Contains hazard warning information and is based on the regulations of ANSI Z535 and ISO 3864.

:insert-hazardstatement[@type=attention].label: t__Attention hazard
:insert-hazardstatement[@type=attention].description: t__Please pay extra attention to this note.

:insert-hazardstatement[@type=caution].label: t__Caution hazard
:insert-hazardstatement[@type=caution].description: t__Indicates a potentially hazardous situation which, if not avoided, might result in minor or moderate injury.

:insert-hazardstatement[@type=danger].label: t__Danger hazard
:insert-hazardstatement[@type=danger].description: t__Indicates an imminently hazardous situation which, if not avoided, will result in death or serious injury.

:insert-hazardstatement[@type=fastpath].label: t__Fastpath hazard
:insert-hazardstatement[@type=fastpath].description: t__This note will speed you on your way.

:insert-hazardstatement[@type=notice].label: t__Notice hazard
:insert-hazardstatement[@type=notice].description: t__Indicates a potential situation which, if not avoided, might result in property damage or in an undesirable result or state.

:insert-hazardstatement[@type=other].label: t__Other hazard
:insert-hazardstatement[@type=other].description: t__This is something other than a normal hazard.

:insert-hazardstatement[@type=remember].label: t__Remember hazard
:insert-hazardstatement[@type=remember].description: t__Don't forget to do what this note says.

:insert-hazardstatement[@type=restrictio.label: t__Restriction hazard
:insert-hazardstatement[@type=restrictio.description: t__You can't do what this note says.

:insert-hazardstatement[@type=tip].label: t__Tip hazard
:insert-hazardstatement[@type=tip].description: t__This is a fine little tip.

:insert-hazardstatement[@type=warning].label: t__Warning hazard
:insert-hazardstatement[@type=warning].description: t__Indicates a potentially hazardous situation which, if not avoided, could result in death or serious injury.
